profile.name: Ujjwal Kumar Singh
profile.bio: I am a final-year undergraduate student specializing in Information Technology at NIT Jalandhar, Punjab. Currently, I am seeking a Software Development Engineer (SDE) role. I have completed a summer internship at Bharti Airtel as a Technical Intern. I enjoy engaging in competitive programming and have undertaken various projects in web development. Additionally, I serve as the Placement Coordinator for my college.

roles.title: Software Engineer, Backend
roles.description: Currently working with Backend Living Team on Collective API and Auth API, used Koajs as backend framework, along with that worked on multiple tech stacks like Elasticsearch, MySQL, Redis, Webhooks.

roles.title: Technical Intern
roles.description: Worked as Data Analyst , Implemented Python scripts utilizing the Pandas library to analyze and process employee data
